description: A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, and anointed with a meager sacrifice.  It can be used to immolate an enemy at close range, or to rapidly spark a more controlled fire if you're desperate.
//: Talismans are crude magic, used mostly by apprentices and beginners in the occult.  They were rare before the Cataclysm due to the scarcity of otherworldly materials, but are more often used by post-Catalcysm occultists--at least those who survive.

description: A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, and anointed with a hunter's sacrifice.  Using it will buoy you up, allowing you to walk on water and also rendering you immune to being slowed by goo or sludge on the ground.

A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, and anointed with a peculiar sacrifice.  Using it will conjure and transmutate a structure of strange earth and stone, to serve as a meager shelter in times of desperation.

A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, anointed with a pure sacrifice.  Using it will greatly lighten you, reducing the encumbrance of your gear, allowing you to fall any distance with no harm, and letting you glide from high surfaces as though you had wings.

A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, anointed with a lucent sacrifice.  Using it will create a flash of light and a boom of thunder, blinding and deafening anyone nearby.  This includes you, so be careful when using it.

A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, and anointed with a sacrifice of nature.  It can be used to mend minor wounds, along with providing limited resistance to certain alchemical effects, though repeated usage in a short period of time will have detremental side effects.

A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, anointed with a natural sacrifice.  Using it will heal any nearby ally, pet, or friendly creature near you, along with enhancing them temporarily.  Friendly NPCs and monsters alike will gain increased speed as well as immunities to various debuffs such as blindness, bleeding, or stunning; while friendly monsters/pets specfically will gain increased melee damage, accuracy, and dodge.
